post.body: One of my favs :)
I've had that happen a couple of times. Good luck and I feel you
I didn't know that but I'm sure they know the implications of living her in America and how people are going to treat him
LOL I have seen those videos before. They are so hilarious and that was one of the funnier ones :)
That would be so awesome but I'll have to wait until next week. Vacation, I so look forward to you :)
LOL Ironically I remember liking that artwork too :)
You must be very colorful and sporting a lot of patterns today :)
I will definitely keep following. I love it when you vent and just throw it out there :)
Uh oh you're the kitty enemy. They are going to get lots of treats when they get home :)
I feel the same way
It's amazing how you can do without cable :) you'll miss some things but you save so much
I does at times but you begin to see who's real, people for who they are, and things about yourself. You are able to rant
lol see that's scary too :)
I love the big eyes :)
Great :)
Got to go for the gusto :)
that's my plan once the city warms up. I want to be a walking tourist and a cycling tourist. Big spring/summer plans :)
Then I would definitely go for it :)
Ohhhhh that sounds like a challenge. If anything I got to be there for that
You guys did good though. But that had to be a harder level that night
Will you be doing the same level you did when you where at D&B? Boy, you all were hauling as on that pad LOL :)
I think so, especially if you already got a ipod
Just broke a beaker and cut my hand. I hope this is not a reflection of what the rest of the day is going to be like, errrrr
http://twitpic.com/tvb7 - More of my distorted artwork :)
Why do people use their kids as tools to make a point? Did you think about his future? http://snipurl.com/8tuoi
RT @Fitz 11 car accident on I-90 right by Touhy (East Bound).
Coffee time :)
I never understood the hankerchief. You blow your nose then put it back in your pocket. That's mcnasty
I wrote some heartfelt & juicy things in my diary. Writing really helps you step back & really see things as they are not as you want them
People are falling off a lot a cruise ships. It doesn't seem a safe way to travel. Knock someone's cocktail over you go over
Heading out to Icosium Kafe to meet up with @lahrsawyer whose back in the Chi. We got a lot to catch up on and plan :)
Meet Kimiko, the squid I built and set free - http://tinyurl.com/6pckfy :)
Ok, Immediate New Years resolutions: Take better and more videos, take better and more photos, get fit, run, ride bike, ditch car when can
Am I the only one who still likes watching the first "National Treasure"? Riley is so adorable :)
Some of these models on Project Runway look as if they have physical disabilities when they walk. I think they ruin a design
I think I drunk too much water because I can't mooooooooove
Yayyyyyy @lahrsawyer is back home in the Chi :0)
